name: Kung Fu Statesmen
storyline: Kung Fu Labour are on a mission. Coming up to the election they need to bury the issues and find the pages from their '97 manifesto to avoid any awkward questions when the new one comes out.
summary: Kung Fu Statesmen is a parody on the political world of the United Kingdom. You choose to play as either Gordon Brown, Tony Blair, or David Blunkett.
